in general.translation[0].definitions[0]: In general, about 10% of the candidates are eventually offered positions.
in general.translation[0].definitions[1]: used when talking about the whole of a situation, group, or thing, rather than specific parts of it
a feeling of dissatisfaction with life in general
These policies are unpopular with politicians and people in general.
